channel.title: Having trouble changing the npc drops
channel.description:
i wanted jad to drop an item besides fire cape so i changed it and i kept fighting the jad but still only got fire cape... So i delte the code 6570 and add my item code (other item) and i then att and STILL get fire cape even though i erased it... what am i doing wrong?
1. go into npcdrops.cfg 2. change the item and amount 3 save
tell me if i do any thing worng!

i wanted jad to drop an item besides fire cape so i changed it and i kept fighting the jad but still only got fire cape… So i delte the code 6570 and add my item code (other item) and i then att and STILL get fire cape even though i erased it… what am i doing wrong?
